title: God Will Not Be Mocked
author: VD
content_html:
Nor will He tolerate the mockery of His Son. The wicked of the world can engage in all the Satanic pomps they like, but it will avail them nothing. They have already been defeated.

“I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me. If you really know me, you will know my Father as well.”

DISCUSS ON SG
